coreAttributes.name: Hot Chocolate
coreAttributes.description: An insulated metal bottle containing hot cocoa. A sticker on the side claims the sweet drink is the perfect comfort during cold winter nights. The sticker also depicts a flame salamander-boy sipping from a similar bottle while louging near an open fire.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A warm wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_RESISTANCE_ICE, 5)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: After unscrewing the cap, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the bottle of hot chocolate up to [npc.her] [npc.mouth]. [npc.She] [npc.is] pleased to find that the label wasn't lying about the drink being sweet and swiftly [npc.verb(drink)] the chocolaty beverage.
useDescriptions.otherUse: After unscrewing the cap, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the bottle of hot chocolate up to [npc2.namePos] waiting [npc2.lips]. [npc2.name] [npc2.is] pleased to find that the label wasn't lying about the drink being sweet and swiftly [npc2.verb(drink)] the chocolaty beverage.
